oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Street scene of Union Street looking east from the intersection at Fifth Avenue North, circa 1918
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a busy Union Street looking east, featuring a column of men walking down the street, vehicle traffic, and businesses like Abrahams Modern Shoe Store, United Clothing Co., Palace Clothing Co., Faucon’s Café, Parrish Shoe Co., Economy Shoe Store, and Loventhal, Frank & Co.. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Loventhal, Frank & Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Faucon’s French Restaurant (Nashville, Tenn.);
